channel.title: MOD DELETe
channel.description:
I downloaded someones halo energy sword as a .dat. I put it in the model editing software and made a version laying down for a wield model and exported it and made it into a dat as well. I then gziped the files and named them 12050 and 12051(wield model) I put them in my model folder for my client. I then went to class 8 and added this code [code]if(i == 8001) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 12051; //Model ID // class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 12050;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 12050;//female wearing class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Halo Energy Sword";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Slash your way through the covenant.. I mean Lesser Demons :D".getBytes();//examin info[/code] Idk if thats right but I put it right after a 3629 numbered one. I dont know if Im supposed to label it higher or not. I just no when I g into my client I added both models and I typed in ::pickup 8000 1. It came up with a small item that is a null and it gives me an error.
I dont know what to do please help me
Oh and in the Dat Making thing I did set the wielded model to 10 and right hand. and for the other i set it to 10 and no anim

item.title: MOD DELETe
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

ok for one thing your modelâ€™s are backwards. So your wield model is being set as drop model, and drop model as wield.

Read full topic

item.title: MOD DELETe
item.dc:creator: @frogtamer101 frogtamer101
item.description:
@frogtamer101 wrote:

I downloaded someones halo energy sword as a .dat. I put it in the model editing software and made a version laying down for a wield model and exported it and made it into a dat as well. I then gziped the files and named them 12050 and 12051(wield model) I put them in my model folder for my client. I then went to class 8 and added this code

if(i == 8001) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 12051; //Model ID // class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 12050;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 12050;//female wearing class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Halo Energy Sword";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Slash your way through the covenant.. I mean Lesser Demons :D".getBytes();//examin info
Idk if thats right but I put it right after a 3629 numbered one. I dont know if Im supposed to label it higher or not. I just no when I g into my client I added both models and I typed in ::pickup 8000 1. It came up with a small item that is a null and it gives me an error.

I dont know what to do please help me

Oh and in the Dat Making thing I did set the wielded model to 10 and right hand. and for the other i set it to 10 and no anim

Read full topic
